name: Acolyte
equipment_option_a: Calligrapher's Supplies, Book (prayers), Holy Symbol, Parchment (10 sheets), Robe, 8 GP
description: You devoted yourself to service in a temple, either nestled in a town or secluded in a sacred grove. There you performed hallowed rites in honor of a god or pantheon. You served under a priest and studied religion. Thanks to your priest's instruction and your own devotion, you also learned how to channel a modicum of divine power in service to your place of worship and the people who prayed there.

name: Criminal
equipment_option_a: 2 Daggers, Thieves' Tools, Crowbar, 2 Pouches, Traveler's Clothes, 16 GP
description: You eked out a living in dark alleyways, cutting purses or burgling shops. Perhaps you were part of a small gang of like-minded criminals who looked out for each other. Or maybe you were a lone wolf, fending for yourself against the local thieves' guild and tougher criminals.

name: Sage
equipment_option_a: Quarterstaff, Calligrapher's Supplies, Book (history), Parchment (8 sheets), Robe, 8 GP
description: You spent your formative years traveling between manors and monasteries, performing various odd jobs and services in exchange for access to their libraries. You whiled away many a long evening studying dusty tomes and ancient knowledge in candlelit chambers. Eventually, you gained the magic of a wizard and set out into the world.

name: Soldier
equipment_option_a: Spear, Shortbow, 20 Arrows, Gaming Set (same as above), Healer's Kit, Quiver, Traveler's Clothes, 14 GP
description: You began training for war as soon as you reached adulthood and carried a weapon as part of a military group. You were part of a standing army or a mercenary company, or perhaps a member of a local militia who rose to adventure during a time of troubles.
